basics.name: Kobus van der Merwe
basics.label: Curriculum Vitae - 2025-09
basics.summary:
Machine Learning & Software Engineer | Freelance Consultant. 

With 25+ years of experience delivering data platforms, MLOps pipelines and bespoke software solutions, I specialize in building scalable, production-grade systems across diverse industries. I bring deep expertise in Python, C#, Kubernetes, OpenShift, and DevOps, combined with strong foundations in distributed systems, data engineering, and real-time data processing.

My background spans graph databases, fraud detection, and large-scale deployments, enabling me to design solutions that bridge research and production seamlessly. I thrive on solving complex problems and helping organisations unlock value through data and automation.

work.name: PwC South Africa
work.summary: Data Modelling Platform design and implementation to enable bespoke actuarial and data science solutions for clients. I am responsible for the design and implementation of platform components, including data ingestion, data processing, and data storage.

work.name: BMW IT Hub South Africa
work.summary: Site reliability engineering and DevOps for the Plant Connectivity product

work.name: Vision Bank
work.summary: I oversaw the design and implementation of the bank's data platform in the Data & Advanced Analytics team from a machine learning and data engineering perspective. I further researched data management practices and solutions for operational data and data warehouse systems, data ingestion and streaming, and enterprise-wide schema and lineage management. At the start of my tenure I also acted as the Development Chapter Lead, managing 60+ software and test engineers across several Spotify tribes. I was responsible for line management, technological decisions, and product research for software engineering and testing.

work.name: MyBucks
work.summary: Cluster provisioning, DevOps Lead, ML Engineering, and fraud detection. In a team of expert data scientists and engineers, I was responsible for the design and implementation of the data and operational platform, MLOps pipelines, and fraud detection systems. I worked closely with other data scientists to deploy machine learning models into production and ensure their scalability and reliability. At the end of my tenure I also acted as CTO after the group restructured.

Openshift and the CentOS nodes was fully automated using Ansible and custom templates.
Automated DevOps pipelines for 25+ projects with GitOps practices.
Provisioned Elastic Search, Kafka, and Neo4J with high availability in Openshift.
Team Lead of an in-house fraud detector using Python and Neo4J.
Provisioned 10+ Postgres and MySQL servers to Openshift.
Developed cross-platform integration for multiple projects.
MS SQL, MongoDB, Neo4J, .NET Web APIs, Python, C#, XGBoost, CUDA, DevOps, MLOps

work.name: Various Clients
work.summary: I have worked as a freelance consultant and permanent resource for various clients, including small businesses, startups, and large enterprises. I have developed mission-critical enterprise services and web/desktop/mobile applications using a variety of technologies across different industries.
highlights: Online shop portal (UI & backend) using ASP.NET Web API, angular, MS SQL, Azure & 3rd party integrations (shipment, ID verification, bank verification).

Built T/SQL reverse engineering tools using Powershell and Microsoft SQL SMO for highly complex MS SQL environments across two data centres. This was done to enable dependency tracing, source control, and regression testing, allowing deterministic retrieval of several hundred SQL objects in a single run.
I designed and implemented 3D terrain rendering, hypsometric tinting, structural monitoring, and satellite image projection software using ASP.NET, C# and T/SQL.
Designed and built robust task management and scheduling software and applied it to data acquisition, database maintenance and video stream processing across multiple projects.

Software engineering for large enterprise clients in the banking and insurance sector. I designed and developed .NET desktop and web solutions in a high security environment, call centre integration platforms and insurance backend systems.
Bespoke ERP software development, using C#, T/SQL, Oracle, Embedded C and C++.
Developed mobile logistics planning and infrastructure and asset management systems using C#, T/SQL, C/C++.
